description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports necessary React modules, styles, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering components, introduced in React 18.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React element into the DOM node.
